name: VBAC Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll -SATSUKI
description:
"MamAmor dolls are beautiful made with so much heart and soul put into them. They engage my children and are so lovely to hug and hold. They are made to educate if you so desire but they are also so well crafted that they can be played with and loved. My family loves having our MamAmor Family from a PapAmor, children and our two MamAmor mommas with the babies. MamAmor has most highly recommended customer service with a heart and we proudly support this wonderful company!"

Cassie A.
------------


SATSUKI is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby. She is a VBAC mama, but she can also demonstrate a cesarean birth.

SATSUKI was made using top quality cotton interlock for skin, fiberfill for filling, and merino yarn from "Manos del Uruguay" from South America- for her gorgeous hair. Her baby comes with placenta, cord, cloth diaper and receiving blanket.

Includes:

- Mama doll 
- baby 
- blanket and diaper for baby 
- top and skirt
- hair clip 
- shoes 
- Birth Certificate

Sling is NOT included.  Find them in ACCESSORIES.

SATSUKI is 18 inches tall (46cm)/ Baby is 5 inches tall (13cm)

name: VBAC Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - AZALEA
description:
"I am so impressed with Pandora! She is so much more than I could have imagined! Wow! She is a gift for my preceptors who have mentored me for this, my final year with the Midwifery Education Programme. She is sure to have a great home in the clinic room, for expectant mommas, siblings and family to teach, inspire and love. 
Thank you all, truly amazing!"

Marissa Kayte Charbonneau
------------------------------------

AZALEA is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby. She is a VBAC mama, but she can also demonstrate a cesarean birth.

name: VBAC Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - CARMEN
description:
“I remember the first time I saw the Mamamor dolls. It is difficult to describe the overwhelming connection I made to these incredibly beautiful mamas. Since that time I have witnessed others having that same kind of response. I have encouraged midwives to have them on hand for therapeutic use. Women seem to open up about their births in such a peaceful way when they are holding these dolls. Then there is the fabulous opportunity for education for young girls. My granddaughters watch the website for new mamas. We love them all.”

Carla Hartley
Ancient Art Midwifery Institute
Trust Birth Initiative
----------------------------

CARMEN is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby. She is a VBAC mama, but she can also demonstrate a cesarean birth.

CARMEN was made using top quality cotton interlock for skin, fiberfill for filling, and merino yarn from "Manos del Uruguay" from South America- for her gorgeous hair. Her baby comes with placenta, cord, cloth diaper and receiving blanket.

Includes:

- Mama doll 
- baby 
- blanket and diaper for baby 
- dress 
- hair clip 
- shoes 
- Birth Certificate

SLING is not included. Find one in ACCESSORIES.

CARMEN is 18 inches tall (46cm)/ Baby is 5 inches tall (13cm)

name: Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - SARAH LYNN
description:
"My daughter is in total awe!! She has not let her Mama and bub leave her side since she got it..and keeps taking my hand and looking up to thank me for her, and tell me how much she loves her. This child is 3 years old!!! I have never seen her quite like this before. The pictures do not do your work justice. These dolls are so amazing, and so gorgeous. Everyone who has met Mama on our travels today has commented on her cool hair and clothes...and then my daughter does a birth demonstration..lol. 
...I cannot express how happy we are with our custom order, and we are just so grateful to have something so special and made with such love. Thank you so much."

Carly Owen 
--------------

SARAH LYNN is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby.

name: VBAC Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - VERONICA
description:
"MamAmor Dolls are exquisitely handcrafted works of art. Pictures do them no justice, as they are much lovelier in person than any photograph can capture. These dolls are heirloom quality, sure to hold up for generations if treated with care.
As a Doula, Childbirth Educator and Student Midwife, I have found these dolls to be quite useful in my practice. Some of my clients have used the dolls to explain the birth process to their children and to share the story of their child's/children's birth with them. I've used the dolls to demonstrate what position their baby is in, and each of my clients have enjoyed holding the dolls and playing with their hair.
My children ADORE our dolls and still play with them (even after nearly 3 years!). One of their favorite activities is to play "Mama dolls". I am proud to teach my children about birth and breastfeeding. It is my hope that, when grown, they believe in their own body's ability to give birth and nourish their children, and that they are not fearful of the process.
To me, these dolls are the epitome of childbirth, motherhood and the sacred relationship between mother and baby. I am thrilled to have these dolls and I look forward to passing them down in my family for generations to come.
IRIS is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby. She is a VBAC mama, but she can also demonstrate a cesarean birth".

Kylie Davis
The Childbearing Year
-----------------------

VERONICA  is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby. She is a VBAC mama, but she can also demonstrate a cesarean birth.

VERONICA was made using top quality cotton interlock for skin, fiberfill for filling, and merino yarn from "Manos del Uruguay" from South America- for her gorgeous hair. Her baby comes with placenta, cord, cloth diaper and receiving blanket.

Includes:

- Mama doll 
- baby 
- blanket and diaper for baby 
- dress 
- hair clip 
- shoes 
- Birth Certificate

Baby carrier is NOT included. Find them in ACCESSORIES, listed as slings.

VERONICA is 18 inches tall (46cm)/ Baby is 5 inches tall (13cm)

name: Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - EVA
description:
"My daughter and I so enjoy our Mamamor dolls.  Each doll is so unique and has her own personality.  I appreciate their resilient construction from natural materials--this adds to their beauty and ensures they will last generations.  I take pride in providing my daughter with such a beautiful and fun way to learn about women's bodies and the wonder of motherhood.  I also use these dolls in my local pregnancy and parenting group to demonstrate the basic positions baby makes in birth, breastfeeding, and baby wearing. Mamamor dolls aren't just beautiful (though they certainly are that) they are also practical and fun for the whole family."

Kate Althouse
Kelvington Birth Matters
-----------------------------

name: Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - MORENA
description:
"She is stunning!!! You do such beautiful work! Bea LOVES her and has already named the baby Emily. She is busy playing with them in her dollhouse now. Thank you!  I took some photos as she was opening the box. The baby fits in her dollhouse cradle and high chair nicely. I showed Bea how a baby is born and nurses, and then she decided that the baby needed a nap under the blanket. She also got a bath already. And Bea wants me to make shoes for the baby too. Thank you, Pauline is going to get lots of play!

Celia Nolan
--------------

JULIETTE was made using top quality cotton interlock for skin, fiberfill for filling, and merino yarn from "Manos del Uruguay" from South America- for her gorgeous hair. Her baby comes with placenta, cord, cloth diaper and receiving blanket.

Includes:

- Mama doll 
- baby 
- blanket and diaper for baby 
- dress 
- hair clip and headband
- shoes 
- birth certificate

Sling is NOT included. Find them in ACCESSORIES.

JULIETTE is 18 inches tall (46cm)/ Baby is 5 inches tall (13cm)

name: Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - ROSIE
description:
"My daughter was delighted that Nina finally arrived. She has autism spectrum disorder and I have never seen her play with a doll. But with Nina, she couldn't stop playing. My daughter cared for Nina and let Nina care for her baby. First the baby was born, then it had to nurse, then they went for a little walk with the baby in the ring sling... Cardigan on, cardigan off, just playing. It was a delight to witness. Thank you so much for making these amazing dolls!"

Monique Van Der Maas
---------------------------

ROSIE is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby.

ROSIE was made using top quality cotton interlock for skin, fiberfill for filling, and merino yarn from "Manos del Uruguay" from South America- for her gorgeous hair. Her baby comes with placenta, cord, cloth diaper and receiving blanket.

Includes:

- Mama doll 
- baby 
- blanket and diaper for baby 
- skirt and top
- hair clip 
- shoes 
- birth certificate

Sling is NOT included. Find them in ACCESSORIES.

ROSIE is 18 inches tall (46cm)/ Baby is 5 inches tall (13cm)

name: Babywearing ONLY MamAmor doll - DOROTHY
description:
"Thanks so much we love them and the first thing she did was give the bub boob ♡♥♡ also the toddler doll and her both had the same hair today with made her like it even more"

Gypsy Price Whitford
--------------------

This is an original Babywearing ONLY MamAmor doll. This doll doesn't have snaps for breastfeeding on breast or on baby's mouth and she doesn't give birth. She comes with a sling.

Includes:

- Mama doll
- baby doll
- blanket and diaper for baby
- top and skirt
- hair clip 
- shoes
- sling
- birth certificate

Shipping is not included.

name: Breastfeeding ONLY MamAmor doll - ANNABELLE
description:
"I am so impressed with Pandora! She is so much more than I could have imagined! Wow! She is a gift for my preceptors who have mentored me for this, my final year with the Midwifery Education Programme. She is sure to have a great home in the clinic room, for expectant mommas, siblings and family to teach, inspire and love. 
Thank you all, truly amazing!"

Marissa Kayte Charbonneau
----------------------------

ANNABELLE is an original Breastfeeding MamAmor doll. She doesn't give birth, she is a breastfeeding only doll.

Includes:

- Mama doll
- baby doll
- blanket and diaper for baby
- top and skirt
- hair clip 
- shoes 
- birth certificate

Shipping is not included.

name: Birthing and Breastfeeding MamAmor doll - CELIE
description:
"I just received my Mama in the mail today, and all I can say is, WOW. There is absolutely no way to grasp the beauty and quality of these dolls until you hold one in your hands. It is apparent that each one has a lot of love put into it. So incredibly blessed to own one!"

Lily May West
---------------------------

CELIE is a one of a kind- original MamAmor doll. She gives birth and breastfeeds her newborn baby.

CELIE was made using top quality cotton interlock for skin, fiberfill for filling, and merino yarn from "Manos del Uruguay" from South America- for her gorgeous hair. Her baby comes with placenta, cord, cloth diaper and receiving blanket.

Includes:

- Mama doll 
- baby 
- blanket and diaper for baby 
- dress 
- hair clip 
- shoes 
- knitted scarf
- birth certificate

Sling is NOT included. Find them in ACCESSORIES.

CELIE is 18 inches tall (46cm)/ Baby is 5 inches tall (13cm)

name: MamAmor Postcards- SET OF 6
description:
Send these beautiful MamAmor Postcards to:

- A pregnant mama/family
- A new mom
- Your midwife, doula, doctor, childbirth educator
- Your wife, friend, sister, mother, cousin
- Your prenatal yoga instructor
- Your chiropractor, acupuncturist, massage therapist
- Yourself!


Printed professionally on heavy cardstock with satin finish.

Measure 139mm x 107mm (4.1/4 x 5.5 inches). 

Blank reverse with MamAmor web info. on bottom.

Includes white envelopes for each card.

Artwork by SoleyCata MOndeart, illustrated exclusively for MamAmor Dolls.

Individual MamAmor Postcards also available. See POSTCARDS for more options.

Wholesale inquires, contact us at wholesale@mamamordolls.com

description:
These cute little toddler girls will be an amazing addition to your MamAmor family! 

They were made using top quality cotton interlock for skin and their hair has a combination of merino yarns from "Manos del Uruguay"

They are 6.5 inches tall (16cm)

They are nursing toddlers, but the snap can be taken off for toddlers that aren't nursing anymore.

Shipping is approximate, we will adjust your total after the purchase is made and we will refund you if needed.

description:
Babywearing PapAmor ELLIOT is a one of a kind -original doll from the MamAmor Dolls family.

He is 18 inches tall (46cm) and he was made with top quality cotton interlock for skin. He was filled with fiberfill, and his hair has a combination merino yarn from "Manos del Uruguay".

- shoes 
- Mai tai

Baby is not included.

Get ELLIOT today!!...He will be a wonderful partner to your MamAmor and baby dolls!

name: Boy MamAmor dolls
description:
Boys can be a wonderful addition to your MamAmor family!

They are not toddlers, they are a bit older than a preschooler, and they come with with top, pants and shoes.

Shipping is approximate, adjusted after purchased.

name: MamAmor Babies
description:
Extra babies for your MamAmor doll!

These are not custom babies, but you can ask for hair/color/eye options available. We'll try to match your request as much as possible. 

Babies come with placenta, cord, diaper and receiving blanket. 

Free shipping with the purchase of a doll.

If you want a custom baby, please email us for information at: info@mamamordolls.com

name: Girl MamAmor dolls
description:
Girls can be a wonderful addition to your MamAmor family!

They are not toddlers, they are a bit older than a preschooler, and they come with dress and shoes.

Shipping is approximate, adjusted after purchased.

name: DEPOSIT on Custom MamAmor Doll
description:
SPOTS FOR CUSTOM DOLLS FOR 2013 ARE VERY LIMITED. 

WE ARE NOT TAKING CUSTOM ORDERS DURING THE MONTHS OF JUNE, JULY AND AUGUST.

PRE-CHRISTMAS MONTHS (OCTOBER-NOVEMBER) ARE THE BUSIEST MONTHS FOR US, SO WE ENCOURAGE YOU TO PLACE YOUR CUSTOM ORDER WITH TIME TO AVOID DISAPPOINTMENTS.

THANK YOU!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

This deposit will ensure your spot for a custom MamAmor Doll after your quote is accepted. This deposit will go towards the total of your doll and it is non-refundable.

We'll send you an invoice for the balance after you see your doll (we'll send you pics) and before she is shipped.

If you have any questions, please email us at info@mamamordolls.com

Thank you.
